default-year-month.desc: The default year and month to display.

events.desc: A list of events to highlight on the calendar. Can be supplied as an array or a function that returns a boolean.

event-color.desc: Color name for a highlighted event from the Quasar Color Palette

options.desc: Sets the days that are selectable. Supplied as an array of dates or a function. If using function, Date is passed to a function that must return a Boolean. (Function(date) => Boolean)

first-day-of-week.desc: Sets the day of the week that is considered the first day. This day will show in the left-most column of the calendar.

today-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current day
